Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP18
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP18.server.controller.divinities

Class Divinity

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.PSP18.server.controller.divinities.Divinity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Apollo, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Demeter, Hephaestus, Minotaur, Pan, Prometheus
    public class Divinity
extends java.lang.Object
    this is the class that implements the generic move and build methods for the players

        name - name of the divinity
        playerManager - player manager that has this divinity
        matchRun - reference of the match running management section

                       Direction direction)

        Parameters:
        oldX - the old position of the worker on the x axis
        oldY - the old position of the worker on the y axis

      • updateMoveCells

        protected void updateMoveCells​(java.lang.Integer oldX,
                               java.lang.Integer oldY,
                               java.lang.Integer newX,
                               java.lang.Integer newY)
        Set worker in a cell and remove from the source one If a worker is present in the destination cell (Apollo) switch workers
        Parameters:
        oldX - the source x position
        oldY - the source y position
        newX - the destination x position
        newY - the destination y position
